mapper.update: update activestep set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userId, status, type, createTime, endTime from activestep
select id, userId, status, type, createTime, endTime from activestep where userId = #{arg0} and type = #{arg1} and endTime > now()
select id, userId, status, type, createTime, endTime from activestep where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and endTime > now()
select id, userId, status, type, createTime, endTime from activestep where type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and endTime > now()
